vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
FindThisHash.solve (FindThisHash.sol#9-12) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(1000000000000000000000) (FindThisHash.sol#11)

vulnerability_findings.name: deprecated-standards
vulnerability_findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected @ FindThisHash.sol#10:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in FindThisHash.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.22 (FindThisHash.sol#1): it allows old versions
